name: Little Willy
description:
Enjoy a  puppet-powered parody of Romeo and Juliet.

After a sold-out run of Little Dickens in 2022, world-renowned Canadian artist Ronnie Burkett returns with his irreverent army of marionettes, this time with a sassy take on the classic star-crossed lovers. 

Burlesque star Dolly Wiggler starts the show with an Elizabethan striptease in this riotously funny improvised mash-up of one of Shakespeare's most beloved plays. All the leading ladies of the Daisy ensemble battle for the role of Juliet, including faded diva Esme Massengill in a boozy interpretation of the lovesick ing√©nue. Beloved audience favourites Schnitzel and Mrs. Edna Rural are back in supporting roles, and adding to the fun and mayhem, The Bard himself joins The Daisy Theatre cast for a twisted retelling of this tragic romance... with strings attached. 

Little Willy is intended for audience members, ages 16 and up.
